CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(ComplaintType__c,"Reclamo Scritto"),IF(TODAY() < SendDate__c + 180 && TODAY() >= SendDate__c + 90 , 25,IF(TODAY() < SendDate__c + 270 && TODAY() >= SendDate__c + 180, 50,IF(TODAY() >= SendDate__c + 270, 75, 0))),null)
CustomField.label: Indennizzo per invio risposta
